author: m.kalinin
content: <@534934855113506836> you may verify a random portion of downloaded blocks. It would give you desired speed boost and still preserve your node from being synced with bad chain. There is a long way to the head, you probably don't want to realize that you've been syncing with wrong chain only after the finish.
